website_summaries.verdict: Google has delivered an impressive smartphone with the Nexus 5 from LG, an unlocked powerhouse with a palatable price and solid performance, and the new Android 4.4.1 KitKat update largely fixes the phone's initial camera problems.
pros: Killer price for an unlocked smartphone
Android is better than ever with 4.4.1 "KitKat," and the camera is much improved
cons: Hardware still isn't quite class-leading on all fronts
Middling voice quality through the microphone

customer_reviews.title: Excellent I have had this phone for three years
customer_reviews.text: Excellent I have had this phone for three years, and so far there is nothing really to complain about. Lovely pictures, clear phone connections, only thing I find that voice notes cut out when I am listening to them sometimes. great buy
customer_reviews.author: raven thorne

customer_reviews.title: DO NOT PURCHASE THESE
customer_reviews.text: I BOUGHT 2 OF THESE PHONES FOR CHRISTMAS . THE FIRST ONE STARTED OVER HEATING WITHIN THE FIRST WEEK OF OPENING IT. I HAD TO UNPLUG IT FROM THE WALL WHILE CHARGING AND ALSO WHEN USING IT, IT WOULD GET EXTREMELY HOT!! HAD TO SHUT IT OFF BECAUSE I WAS WORRIED FOR ARE SAFETY.😡 THE SECOND ONE LASTED ONLY 3 DAYS BEFORE IT POWERED ITSELF OFF AND WOULD NEVER TURN BACK ON!! I WOULD OF RETURNED BOTH OF THEM BUT IT WAS PAST THE RETURN DATE. I FAILED BY NOT TRYING THEM OUT RIGHT FROM THE GET GO. I DEFITENTLY WOULD ADVISE OTHERS NOT TO PURCHASE THESE UNLESS YOU WANT YOUR HOUSE TO BURN DOWN OR TO BE INJURED. 😔
customer_reviews.author: Haley W.

customer_reviews.title: Shame on "Mobile Front", Shame on LG, Shame on Nexus 5, waste of $450.00
customer_reviews.text: My experience with this purchase is beyond bad. Sound quality was horrible from day one. The phone start failing after nine months bit the dust in less than a year. And get this: LG decline to honor factory warranty because this is an "International Phone". The seller "Mobile Front" did not feel that it is necessary to mention this petty detail: i.e. that phone has no warranty.  (Now their webpage does, but it did not when I bought the phone.) Shame on "Mobile Front", shame on LG. Filed formal compliant with Amazon.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Amazing phone
customer_reviews.text: Best phone I've ever owned. Better than my iPhone 4S by far. Perfect screen size for my hands, though maybe not for everyone. I have long fingers. Someone with smaller hands would definitely have difficulty operating this one handed. Got this instead of the Nexus 6 because of the size and I don't regret it.
customer_reviews.author: Murray

customer_reviews.title: This phone has better specs than the iPhone 6 and came out a ...
customer_reviews.text: This phone has better specs than the iPhone 6 and came out a year before. For the price there is nothing that can beat this phones value plus you always get the newest Android version since this is a Google developer phone. I have 5.0 Lollipop before anybody else. Works great on T-Mobile but you won't get LTE since it is missing the bands. HSDPA+ works though.
customer_reviews.author: Tridangertoluene

customer_reviews.title: Great device
customer_reviews.text: Great device, easier to get signal compared to my old nexus 4. incredible display, It is a very fast, fast phone, no lags at all, android 4.4.4 it is a breeze on it. The camera is really good, the screen is incredible. I recommend this device, No problems so far. My only cons, back protection case is mandatory. Purchased the Ringkle slim, Battery life should be better, anyway I've charged it a couple of time, sure the performance is going to increase a but with more charging cycles. Im very happy now, close to perfection on cell phones.
customer_reviews.author: Sergio.

customer_reviews.title: I bought this cell phone in October/2014 and it was ...
customer_reviews.text: I bought this cell phone in October/2014 and it was working well but it came with a Brazilian charger, then I realized that it was an international phone and the seller didn't say it anywhere. But it was not a problem until this week, when my device stopped working and I called LG support and they told me that they can't do anything because it is an international phone! Now, I'm so angry with a device spoiled.
customer_reviews.author: Thiago

customer_reviews.title: I have had this phone for only a few days ...
customer_reviews.text: I have had this phone for only a few days, so I am not ready to give it 5 stars. The one thing I want people to know is that the international version means that it has a round-pegged plug which cannot be used in US outlets. Not a big deal as I have other plugs that work with the USB cord, but I hadn't realized this from the product description. I wasn't sure what "international version" meant.
customer_reviews.author: Laura Kotovsky

customer_reviews.title: Good cell phone
customer_reviews.text: I bought it because it is still very good telephone equipment, as it has the net android system.
customer_reviews.author: Enrique E.

customer_reviews.title: A solid phone
customer_reviews.text: Bought this in September of 2017 and was an excellent phone for me for the next 2 and a half years. Eventually the power button crapped out, the plug wore out and battery life got worse and worse, but hey, for $100 who can go wrong?
customer_reviews.author: penname

customer_reviews.title: Doesn’t work out of the USA.
customer_reviews.text: Had the phone for 6 weeks while traveling couldn’t use. It, Just keep running google advertisements, running the battery low and overheating the phone.
customer_reviews.author: Flora O.

customer_reviews.title: The seller is a liar!
customer_reviews.text: 1.it's D820, not D821. 2.no box. 3.no charger 4.no manual book 5.no check card pin 6.usb port had used mark
customer_reviews.author: housekeeping

customer_reviews.title: Very Smart phone
customer_reviews.text: This is a great phone. I really like the way it feels, looks, and how intuitively easy it is to program as well as use. It's simple to make all kinds of major changes in the way it looks and operates. The only down side is the battery. It runs down very quickly. That said, I'm still thrilled with and will recommend it to others.
customer_reviews.author: Claudia Calisch

customer_reviews.title: Great phone if the screen didnt crack after 2 weeeks!
customer_reviews.text: Very happy with purchase. Came on time and was brand new. Within a couple of weeks, I noticed a crack in the bottom right hand corner of the screen. This was annoying seeing as my last phone made it over a year without so much as a scratch on the screen. Unfortunately purchasing this way, as far as I could tell, left me without a warranty. I was aware of this before purchasing the item but I also expected the item to last longer than a couple of weeks before cracking. My experiences purchasing phones from amazon this holiday season has given me second thoughts of ever doing it again.
customer_reviews.author: B MacDonald

customer_reviews.title: Highly disappointed with LG
customer_reviews.text: Highly disappointed with LG. Within a year, the sound quality had gotten so bad, the person on the other line can barely hear me. The processor speed and camera are decent but sound quality had really gone bad over time.
customer_reviews.author: Rac

customer_reviews.title: Bad experience
customer_reviews.text: Bad experience when buying 2 of this device and when opening the box and running the mobile does not work. Note that I purchased the device as a new I think it has been installed on me. My trust in Amazon began to end.
customer_reviews.author: Ossama

customer_reviews.title: Bad experience with this product
customer_reviews.text: I got this nexus 5 on time, however, I was so surprised to discover that the box was already open. I phone worked normally over 2 months, but then started to shut down randomly even if it is fully charged. Now, I cannot use my phone properly it keeps switching off, I tried to upgrade the software to lollipop but this has never solved the problem. Bad experience with this product :/
customer_reviews.author: Hamza Lamzadrhi

customer_reviews.title: Google won again
customer_reviews.text: Best phone in the market. The only downside is that after 6 months (heavily) use the microphone broke and doesn't work properly. But I have it without a case or a screen guard and it looks brand new
customer_reviews.author: Stefania nelson

customer_reviews.title: Probable refurbished, wreless charging not working, because needed module is not installed at all
customer_reviews.text: This phone came to me with the wireless charger removed. I think it was a refurbished one, with the back panel not original. It's because there was no wireless charging part, no IMEI sticker on the back and I've noticed right away that there was no magnets - this phone do not get attached to the original Google Nexus wireless charger pad properly
customer_reviews.author: trefmanic

customer_reviews.title: THE BATTERY'S BROKEN.
customer_reviews.text: Out of the box, the phone REFUSES to charge AT ALL. The battery symbol pops up, as if it's completely out of battery, and then the phone shuts off. This repeats for as long as it's plugged in. Whenever I try to boot the phone via the power button when it's PLUGGED IN, it goes into the google splash screen, and then shuts off. I'm going to leave the device plugged in for the day/night, and see what happens. Very, very unhappy.
customer_reviews.author: Will Kolbrener

customer_reviews.title: Was fine for 1 month
customer_reviews.text: It wont last. Used it in Europe, shortly the screen went black and the battery does not charge. I could turn it on but it is a matter of time it turns off and I can't do anything with it. It is useless. Free yourself from frustration and do not buy it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: CAUTION - Duplicate components .. phone blanked out in 7 days, lost all data.
customer_reviews.text: After only 7 days of using it, the phone blanked out and lost all data. The phone would not restart. Had to take it into a Authorized LG service center. The technician came up with the following analysis - 1. There is no IMEI number listed anywhere on the phone 2. Everything on and in the phone was a duplicate except the mother board - from the battery to the cover to the components 3. The speaker was spoiled 4. The charging unit had to be replaced as it was not original and was not assembled currently I ended up paying $125 in repair charges and out of commission/without a phone for 7 days. Am very surprised and feel cheated.
customer_reviews.author: Faisal Y. Patel

customer_reviews.title: Phone is a brick
customer_reviews.text: The phone worked properly for couple of months without a problem. Only problem I had was the batter runs out in about one day. Suddenly there was a problem in charging, once you plug the charger it started to reboot in a loop and keeps on repeating until the battery dies. I had to switch back to a backup phone after spending $289 for a brick.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Poor quality product
customer_reviews.text: I bought two of these phone and one of them isn’t working . Battery keeps dying even when it’s turned off
customer_reviews.author: Shawn Power

customer_reviews.title: This phone is 16GB NOT 32GB
customer_reviews.text: This phone is really fast and smooth for a 2013 phone, and has good battery! The condition of this good is really good for being used. The only complaint I have for this phone is that the internal storage is NOT 32G. I'm really bummed out about this, because I was hoping to download music and videos! I also go through my GBs like crazy, too. So I'm really upset about that. Other then that, I can't really complain about this phone.
customer_reviews.author: ih3artpandas

customer_reviews.title: From Nexus 4 to Nexus 5
customer_reviews.text: The Nexus 5 is an awesome phone — great battery life and camera. I miss the weight of the Nexus 4, but that's about it. No learning curve or issues with using this in Canada, just waiting for my network to let me download Lollipop. The box arrived in perfect condition and fully sealed, accompanied by an extra mystery plug rubber-banned to the box exterior. I guess there are worse things that could be attached.
customer_reviews.author: Rachel

customer_reviews.title: Red is Very Bright Red - almost highlighter Red
customer_reviews.text: The phone seems great overall, but the color is blinding. My mom will need to buy a cover.

Terrible experience...

customer_reviews.title: Refurbished phone
customer_reviews.text: After one month of usage the phone started to shut itself down without any pattern identified. I've tried all software solutions that I've found online to fix my issue without any success. "Luckily" I've managed to crack my display and took the phone into a service. They found out that the phone was previously opened, components were not glued like in an original phone. I've changed the battery and screen and now everything works as it should. Service conclusion: the phone was refurbished.

product_meta.title: LG Google Nexus 5 D821 Factory Unlocked Phone, 32GB, White International Version No Warranty
feature_bullets: 8 MP camera w/ autofocus and optical image stabalizer
Wi-Fi 802.11 a/b/g/n/ac, dual-band, Wi-Fi hotspot with Android OS, v4.4 (KitKat)
Unlocked cell phones are compatible with GSM carriers such as AT&T and T-Mobile, but are not compatible with CDMA carriers such as Verizon and Sprint.
This cell phone may not include a US warranty as some manufacturers do not honor warranties for international version phones. Please contact the seller for specific warranty information.
